activities.name: Window Arch
activities.description:
This short 300 Feet hike is perfect for families with young kids. Located behind campsite #37, this short walk leads
            to the impressive Window Arch which spans over 20 feet.Windows bathtubs and caves sculpted by forces of erosion are featured along with spectacular
            views of the“ Inner City”.

activities.name: Stairways Trail
activities.description:
If you want great views of the towering 'Inner City' spires, then take the Creekside Towers Trail for a 1/2 mile where you can access
            the Stairways Trail.This additional 1 / 5 mile trail will connect to the South Fork Circle Creek Trail and loop you back to the beginning.

activities.name: Bath Rock trail: Rock Climbing
activities.description:
Not a long loop, Only 1800 feet, however if you want to see the natural pools there are some very steep climbs along the 240-foot high formation.
            Great spot to start young climbers out on their first climbs.
